gradle/org.gradle.nativeplatform/NativeLibraryBinarySpec

NativeLibraryBinarySpec

@Incubating
interface NativeLibraryBinarySpec : NativeBinarySpec, LibraryBinarySpec(source)

Represents a binary artifact that is the result of building a native library component.
